AFFECT /qt/qml/xofm/modules/settings/qml/QuickSettingsWindow.qml 
    IMPORT device.ui.text 1.0

    TRAVERSE BaseView > Item > Background > ColumnLayout > Item > RowLayout#statusRow

        LOCATE BEFORE MinimalBatteryIndicator#batteryIndicator
        INSERT {
            TextParagraph {
                id: clocks
                text: Qt.formatTime( new  Date(), "hh:mm")
            }   
        }

    END TRAVERSE

END AFFECT
